Row.Text: Mountains will provide +1 [ICON_CULTURE] if worked by the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital, but otherwise have no base yield in other cities. With Stone Works, Aqueduct, Observatory and Machu Pichu you can increase the yields from Mountains.

Set.Text: Each source of [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble and [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and Mountains can be worked for +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
Stone Works increases City [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. It is especially effective if the City has access to [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble, [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone, or Mountains.
40% of [ICON_FOOD] Food is carried over after a new [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen is born. All Mountains worked by this city produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.

The Aqueduct decreases the amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food a city needs to increase in size by 40%. It also can bring water down from Mountains, increasing the [ICON_FOOD] Food yield of those panels when worked.
All Mountains worked by this city produce +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built within 2 tiles of a Mountain that is inside your territory.
The Observatory can only be constructed in a city near a mountain tile. It greatly increases the [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output of the city.

+25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold from [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections. All Mountains worked by this city produce +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built within 2 tiles of a Mountain that is inside your territory.

Row.Text: Berge bringen +1 [ICON_CULTURE] ein, wenn von der [ICON_CAPITAL] Hauptstadt bearbeitet, in anderen Städten gibt es hingegen keine Basiserträge. Mit Steinmetz, Aquädukt, Observatorium und Machu Pichu können die Erträge von Bergen erhöht werden.

Set.Text: Alle Quellen von [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marmor und [ICON_RES_STONE] Stein, die von dieser Stadt bearbeitet werden, generieren +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Produktion und Berge können für +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] bewirtschaftet werden
Steinwerke erhöhen die [ICON_PRODUCTION] Produktion einer Stadt, die von [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marmor und [ICON_RES_STONE] Stein, sowie die von Bergen die von dieser Stadt bewirtschaftet werden.
40% [ICON_FOOD] Nahrung bleibt erhalten, wenn ein neuer [ICON_CITIZEN] Bürger geboren wird. Alle bewirtschafteten Berge dieser Stadt produzieren +1 [ICON_FOOD] Nahrung.

Der Aquädukt verringert die zum Wachstum der Stadt benötigte [ICON_FOOD] Nahrung um 40%. Baut Aquädukte in Städten, die mit der Zeit groß werden sollen. Außerdem transport es das Wasser mithilfe der Berge und erhöht damit die [ICON_FOOD] Nahrungsproduktion der Bergfelder.

Alle bewirtschafteten Berge dieser Stadt produzieren +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Wissenschaft.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Die Stadt darf maximal 2 Felder von einem Berg innerhalb deines Territoriums entfernt sein, nur dann ist das Observatorium baubar.
Das Observatorium ist nur in der Nähe von Bergen baubar (2Felder). Es erhöht die Generierung von [ICON_RESEARCH] Wissenschaft der Stadt pro Berg.

+25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold von [ICON_CONNECTED] Handelswegen.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Alle bewirtschafteten Berge dieser Stadt produzieren +2 [ICON_PEACE] Glauben[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Stadt darf höchstens 2 Geländefelder von einem Berg innerhalb Eures Territoriums entfernt sein.
